variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-class-inspector
dependencies.description: Get information about a class and its structure

dependencies.name: perl-json-maybexs
dependencies.description: Use Cpanel::JSON::XS with a fallback to JSON::XS and JSON::PP

dependencies.name: perl-libwww-perl
dependencies.description:
The libwww-perl collection is a set of Perl modules which provides a
simple and consistent application programming interface to the World-
Wide Web. The main focus of the library is to provide classes and
functions that allow you to write WWW clients.

dependencies.name: perl-module-pluggable
dependencies.description: Automatically give your module the ability to have plugins

dependencies.name: perl-moose
dependencies.description: A postmodern object system for Perl 5

dependencies.name: perl-mro-compat
dependencies.description: Provides several utilities for dealing with method resolution order.

dependencies.name: perl-namespace-autoclean
dependencies.description: Namespace::Autoclean - Keep imports out of your namespace

dependencies.name: perl-test-requires
dependencies.description: Checks to see if the module can be loaded.
